TrainingDetails.Name: Content Full-width

IfComponent.label: Check if this is a component tutorial

TrainingDetails.Title: Content Full-width
TrainingDetails.Abstract: A blank page with header information. It is only to be used by creative services and University Communications
TrainingDetails.BodyCopy:
This page type is a completely empty page, with the exception of the upper navigation and title header. Only the Communications and Creative Services Departments can use this page.

 

All code goes into the body copy.

Required Elements on this page(These elements are needed to save the page):

  • Title
  • Abstract

Title
The title of the page

Abstract

A summary of the index

Site Control

You will need to choose the site control that is related to your department. This is not require for this page to render correctly since there is no left navigation on this page.
